item.title: UWC Horizon Foundation Scholarship – 2021
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: The Department of Education, CTA is happy to announce that the application for Horizon Foundation Scholarship for UWC -2021 is now available; to study International Baccalaureate (11th & 12th standard equivalent) across 18 United World Colleges (UWC). The Department of Education is partnering with the UWC Committee, India for the selection of Tibetan students in...

item.title: Scholarship for NEET/JEE Gap Year Study – 2020
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: The Department of Education, CTA is pleased to announce Scholarship to 10 Students who wish to take a gap year to prepare for next year NEET (MBBS) & JEE (Engineering) exam. The Scholarship holder must undergo coaching from a reputed coaching institute in India. Interested candidates must apply online using the link below. https://forms.gle/Dd1EtvazhWmPN4h16 From-A...

item.title: 2021 Berea College Scholarship
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: The Department of Education, CTA is happy to inform that the fall 2021 International Application for Admission & Scholarship for undergraduate program in Berea College is now available. Interested candidates may check the below link for eligibility criteria, application and other detail information:   Apply as an International Student   The deadline for international applications...

item.title: Sikyong Professional Scholarship Program – 2020
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: The Department of Education, CTA is pleased to announce Sikyong Professional Scholarship Program (SPSP) in partnership with the Tibet Fund, New York. This scholarship will be provided to 5 high achieving Tibetan students from India, Nepal, and Bhutan to pursue Master’s program in Medicine, Law and Business studies at the most selective Colleges or Universities...

item.title: Correspondence Course Scholarship – 2020
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: The Department of Education (DoE), CTA is happy to announce 75 Correspondence Course (CC) Scholarship for CTA staffs, Teachers, Students of Sarah/ Norbulingka Institute and for those who did not get opportunity to attend college after completing Class XII. This scholarship is provided to further improve one’s educational qualification. Interested candidates must apply online through...
